news.title: Jim Gavin insists he will serve just one ‘extremely active’ term if he wins presidency
news.summary: Jim Gavin has said he will serve just one term as president if he is successful in next month’s election.

news.title: Irish presidential race: Number’s up for mathematician, lawyer and professor as hopes are thwarted by council
news.summary: It had been a long day, and it felt like spirits had begun to flag in Roscommon council chamber as councillors heard from a myriad of presidential hopefuls.

news.title: ‘Shifting sands’ of John Magnier’s story were his undoing in Barne Estate case
news.summary: A number of witnesses in the Barne Estate case characterised the dispute as a “war” between two rich and powerful men.

news.title: Pressure growing on the Government to pay energy credits in upcoming Budget
news.summary: The pressure on the Government to pay energy credits in next month’s Budget is piling up after a new survey found a majority of people see the payments as a top priority.

news.title: Donegal champions St Eunan’s consider appeal over 16th player after defeat to Termon
news.summary: St Eunan’s are considering a challenge to the result of their Donegal SFC preliminary quarter-final against Termon last Saturday on the basis that their opponents had 16 players on the field when they got their leveller near the end of extra-time.

news.title: Israeli defence minister says ‘Gaza is burning’ after heavy bombing as ground invasion of Gaza City begins
news.summary: Israel’s defence minister said on Tuesday that “Gaza is burning” after heavy strikes overnight targeted Gaza City.

news.title: ‘Farmers are part of the solution to our problems’ – Independent presidential candidate Catherine Connolly
news.summary: Catherine Connolly is slow to declare her proudest moment, when I ask her about it.

news.title: What is the 50/30/20 budget rule and can it help you achieve your savings goals?
news.summary: Everyone has heard of it. It’s even a meme, a TikTok hashtag and a template for how to live your life.

news.title: ‘My parents transferred the farm to my brother on the understanding he would care for them. But now he is putting Mam in a home and expects the rest of us to foot the bill’
news.summary: Query:  Dear Mary Frances, I am looking for guidance regarding nursing home fees. A number of years ago, my father died. My mother continued to live independently on the family farm.

news.title: The Irish Independent’s View: Donald Trump’s America First approach is giving Russia room to test the West
news.summary: Power is seen as the ability to get things done. But the ability to get things undone can also be devastating, as Russia is currently demonstrating. When America was the catalyst for setting the course of the West, there was a robust guardrail on world order.
